授業目的: In this class, students will acquire basic knowledge of the American political and social system in order to understand American society. Students will then deepen their understanding of various contemporary American issues.
到達目標:
Students will deepen their understanding of American society and politics.
Students will be able to explain various issues in American society.
授業方法: Classes will be conducted in seminar format. From the second class onward, a person will be assigned to be in charge of the assigned paper, and the person in charge will summarize the paper (about 10 lines). Students other than the presenter will read the paper, prepare 3 questions and impressions (about 3 lines per question), and send them to the instructor in charge via LUNA by the day before the class.
